sentences.sContent: Cars are prohibited, so transportation is by electric cart or by horse and buggy.
sentences.sCn: 由于汽车被禁止使用，交通依赖于电车或轻便马车。

phrases.pCn: [英国俚语]处于困境，处于失利地位；为难
高尔夫球车；球具手推车

words.tran: [化学] 载体；运送者；带菌者；货架
运货马车夫，驾驶货车的人

trans.tranOther: a vehicle with no roof that is pulled by a horse and used for carrying heavy things
to take something somewhere in a cart, truck etc
